data_hints.pricing_location: Main page has a pricing table. Early bird: $315 (2026), Regular: $345 (2026). Early bird deadline is ~4 weeks before each session. Prorated pricing for holiday-shortened weeks (Sessions 1 & 3): Early $244, Regular $268
data_hints.hours_location: Main page header - 8:15am to 5:15pm. Drop-off window likely earlier, pick-up window noted as 4:30pm+
data_hints.extended_care: Extended care is INCLUDED in the price - this is a key differentiator. No additional cost for the full 8:15am-5:15pm window

policies.cancellation: 4+ weeks before session: 90% refund; Illness: $25/day refund with doctor note

registration.note: Registration opens at 10am; early bird pricing available until ~4 weeks before each session

testimonials: We are thankful for this full-day camp as full-time working parents, the energy of the counselors, the safe environment, variety of activities and access to UCSB campus and resources.
My kids have always loved this camp! They love the variety of activities and the chance to swim and jump off the high dive. The weekly themes are great and the carnival is always a big hit.

special_notes: The UCSB Day Camp page is comprehensive with all info on one page. Key selling points: full-day with extended care INCLUDED (8:15am-5:15pm), university facilities including pool and high dive, themed weeks with Friday dress-up days. Gauchos group (ages 11-14) gets special activities at Sci Trek lab. The carnival week (Session 5) is highlighted as especially popular. Jr Counselor program available for teens. Site is built on Drupal 10.
